casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Preston SMITH. No. 407P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 16, 2004. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Smith. Ronald L. Moore, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of August 2004 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of August 2004."
